ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken?
What is your overall assessment of this course?
Do you expect to use this class for credit toward your major, or toward a pre-professional program?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize ECON 110 05 for a fellow student? Would you recommend ECON 110 05 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It is a lot of work, but you learn a lot. I recommend it to other students who are seriously willing to work hard to improve their Spanish writing skills.
The class helped me improve my Spanish writing, and the peer-editing technique actually worked very well. Tortora was very helpful and encouraging.
Take it if you want to improve your writing, because you definitely will!
It's great, please do yourself a favor and take this course with Pfe. Tortora. It's a great way to learn, improve your writing, and connect with other students.

I would recommend Writing in Spanish for another student because it is a good class. The readings were interesting, as were the assignments. I really improved in my Spanish writing and speaking skills. Though sometimes some of the work (i.e. peer editing) felt like a drag, once you got into it, you really saw the importance of practices like that. Professor Tortora is very understanding and a great teacher--she'll really work with you if you're having trouble.

Spanish 244 strengthens writing, peer-revision, and analytical skills. It also strengthens vocabulary and grammar. I would recommend this course to any student who wishes to improve his/her language skills.
